name: Captain America OG
description: Captain America OG is a sativa-leaning OG cut with uplifting euphoria and a bright citrus flavor. Relieving anxiety without the debilitating weight of heavier OG crosses, call on “The Captain” for relief of stress as well as nausea, mild physical pain, and muscle spasms. This strain’s moderate body effects and complementary euphoria make it ideal for use any time of the day with mindful dosage.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Relaxed, Creative, Happy, Depression, Pain, Stress, Inflammation, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dry Eyes
